name: Liberal Crime Squad
description:
Liberal Crime Squad is a graphical remake of Toady One's game by the same name: http://www.bay12games.com/lcs/

It's made with Unity and I'm planning on releasing the project/source files once I've at least reached feature parity with the original game (right now the progress is at roughly 80% - most major features are in, but a lot of minor ones aren't).

This page, as with the game itself, is still very much a WIP.
